cause.description:
Let's face it. The young people of today have to live with the decisions of politicians just as much as anyone else. So why shouldn't our voice be just as powerful as theirs?This is a bi-partisan group aimed toward empowering young people to get out and not only vote, but to make their voices heard in any way. That could mean protests, blogging, or passing out fliers. Anything you can do to make even the smallest amount of a difference. So what are you waiting for? Get out there and be part of the change.
1. Young people need to get out and fight for a cause.
cause.mission: To empower as many young people as possible to make their voice heard
cause.name: Youth Empowerment Project for Change
